item.description:
*PRANA FREE SPEAKER SERIES* March 8th @ 6pm

Raw Fusion: Artfully Blending Cooked and Raw Foods

Please join us for a free lecture by Dr. LindaJoy Rose!
Dr Rose will speak on:
*Raw Fusion: Philosophy and Practice
*The 4 Cornerstones of Raw Fusion
*Getting your Family on Board
*Easy-to-do Psychological Techniques to Help you Achieve Your Goals

LindaJoy Rose, Ph.D. is the pioneer of the raw fusion movement, marrying raw foods with a healthy mainstream lifestyle. Dr. Rose is the author of Raw Fusion: Better Living Through Living Foods volumes I and II. She is a raw foods educator and chef around Tampa Bay and also an internationally known author, expert and trainer in the fields of hypnotherapy, subconscious dynamics and Jungian psychology. Dr. Rose has also served as Director of International Development Of the American Board of Hypnotherapy for many years. For more information on Dr. Rose visit: www.rawfusionliving.com and www.drljrose.com. Copies of Raw Fusion: Better Living Through Foods will be available for purchase and signing at this event.

Join the PRANA Family for this *FREE* and life-changing seminar.

*Please note: you will be able to purchase dinner at the restaurant during the event. Please bring a yoga mat or cushion as seating. Please ask to be seated with Meetup and contact other Meetup members via message to meet and carpool. Enjoy!

If not now, then when?

***

Have the best day ever!
Namaste!

Taylor & Philippe
and
The Prana Restaurant Team

EatAtPrana.com

"Until further notice, celebrate everything."
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup and contact other members via message to meet and carpool. Enjoy!
item.name: FREE Lecture @ Prana: Dr. LindaJoy Rose
